document.full_text: amar'e stoudemire missed the game with an injury, but chauncey billups eased concerns about an injury of his own in the win over the nets.
document.title: knicks 116, nets 93: rout helps heal the ailing knicks
lines_and_colors: amar'e stoudemire missed the game with an injury, but chauncey billups eased concerns about an injury of his own in the win over the nets.
